**Goal Progress Report**

This report indicates you are **on track** to achieve your general wealth building goal of $1,000,000 within your 20-year time horizon. Your current portfolio of $100,000 is projected to grow to a median value of $2,105,066 over the next two decades, significantly exceeding your target. This positive outlook is supported by an implied annual growth rate of 16.46%, which comfortably outpaces the 12.20% required to reach your goal.

The Monte Carlo simulation suggests your current investment strategy, focused on a diversified mix of technology stocks (AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL, AMZN) and bonds (BND), has a strong potential for long-term success. While short-term fluctuations are expected, with a 77.8% probability of a positive return in any given year, your portfolio demonstrates resilience. The median projection of over $2.1 million highlights the power of compounding and your chosen asset allocation.

To maintain this favorable trajectory and further optimize your portfolio, we recommend two key actions. First, consider rebalancing your portfolio annually to ensure your allocation to technology stocks and bonds remains aligned with your moderate risk tolerance. This might involve trimming positions in the top-performing tech stocks and increasing your allocation to BND if it drifts too far from its target weight. Second, we should explore increasing your annual savings contributions. Even a modest increase, say an additional $500 per month, could further accelerate your wealth accumulation and provide an even larger buffer against market volatility.

Your current progress is excellent, and the simulation provides a very encouraging outlook. By continuing to monitor and adjust your portfolio through disciplined rebalancing and considering modest increases in your savings, you are well-positioned to not only meet but significantly surpass your wealth-building aspirations. We will continue to review your progress regularly to ensure you remain on this successful path.
